name: Hans Raj Tiwary
content: Homepage of Hans Raj Tiwary Department of Applied Mathematics About Teaching Research Publications Contacts Hans Raj Tiwary Department of Applied Mathematics Faculty of Mathematics and Physics Charles University Malostransk� n�m. 25 118 00 Prague 1 hansrajkam.mff.cuni.cz 22191-4307 257531014 (fax) I am an associate professor (Docent) in the Department of Applied Mathematics of the Faculty of Mathematics and Physics at the Charles University in Prague. If you are interested in doing a student project with me, please read this and have a look at my research page.
